response.overview: Barbara and Oliver Rose live happily as a married couple. When Barbara starts to wonder what life would be like without Oliver and likes what she sees, the two begin a campaign to force each other to leave their house, with their divorce lawyer D'Amato caught in the middle.
response.tagline: Once in a lifetime comes a motion picture that makes you feel like falling in love all over again. This is not that movie.
response.title: The War of the Roses

titles.title: Der Rosenkrieg - Bis dass der Tod uns scheidet
